meanings.definition: The action of delaying or rescheduling an event or appointment.
meanings.sent1: The postponements of the meeting caused confusion among the team members.
meanings.sent2: The company announced several postponements of the product launch.
meanings.sent3: The postponements of the party made the guests wonder if it would ever happen.
meanings.sent4: Her constant postponements of deadlines earned her a reputation for being unreliable.
meanings.sent5: The postponements of the flight left passengers frustrated and stranded at the airport.

meanings.definition: Instances of events or appointments being delayed or rescheduled.
meanings.sent1: The postponements of the wedding led to logistical challenges for the couple.
meanings.sent2: There were multiple postponements of the concert due to bad weather.
meanings.sent3: The postponements of the game resulted in fans creating memes about the delays.
meanings.sent4: The postponements of the project deadline felt like a never-ending cycle of setbacks.
meanings.sent5: The postponements of the event left attendees disappointed and frustrated.
